name: Tuna Casserole I
author: CARMENMJ
summary: My father made this when I was small, and it was always a family favorite.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 1 1/2 quart casserole dish
Spread 1 cup crushed potato chips evenly on bottom of casserole dish
Next, layer 1 can of tuna, half of the peas, and half of the soup
Place slices of cheese on top of this
Repeat layering with tuna, peas and soup
Finish with a layer of chips, and top with slices of cheese
Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until bubbly and golden brown
